text: Soukohp dono ingoo go Elijah, tangada mai Tishbe i Gilead, ga helekai gi di King Ahab, “I di ingoo Dimaadua, go di God mouli o digau Israel dela e hai hegau ginai au, au e hagi adu bolo deai di magalillili be di uwa i lodo nia ngadau e lua be e dolu ai, gaa dae loo gi dagu helekai ma gaa hai.”17.1 James 5.17
